sentence.Network_en: She swims twice a week and has been dabbling in weight training.

...}鸭亚科（学名：Anatinae）是雁形目鸭科下的一个亚科，其下的物种通常被称为「浅层水鸭」（dabbling ducks），在水面觅食，不会潜入水中。鸭亚科还包含已灭绝的Moa-nalo|Moa-nalo，是和浅层水鸭演化关系接近的另一支.
She dabbles in painting as a hobby ., 她学点绘画作为业余爱好.

entry.def: If you dabble in something, you take part in it but not very seriously
